title: Unable to join ques for some odd reason
body: I dont know where this problem is stemming from, but ive had many issues with my account during the past couple years that ive played this game. Before it was a firwall error but now for some reason ques are not popping for me. Whenever i que with friends i can hear the que pop through them, yet for me it doesnt. So i tried hitting the end que button and it brings up the accept/decline options. When i click accept, i join the lobby for the other people in the game but i immediately dc, yet i never get into the pick/ban stage. When i hit decline my client gets stuck and i need to relogg. This has only started since this patch. If a rioter or someone could help me with this that would be great. Ive tried repairing my client, and the problem is persisting. this only seams to happen in blind but its infuriating. ive gotten some time restrictions to joining ques and its really dumb.

replies.body: When you are in queue and accept, your network is trying to transition you over into the same room with everyone.  A poor connection can cause you to lose sync or fail to receive your acceptance.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up by troubleshooting your network strength.  Let me know if you have any questions!
